name: Product

settings.label: Product Popup Enable
settings.info: When 'Product Zoom' enabled and product style 'Default' then it applicable

settings.label: Description Word Count
settings.info: If 'Short Description' is selected and the shortcode is not used, then it will be applicable

settings.label: Variant image enable
settings.info: The variant image will replace in color field if each variant each image selected. It's applicable for 'Swatch Option'
